document_data.name: [[Berost]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Berost''' was a man-at-arms of [[Shadowdale]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: While escorting [[Shandril Shessair]], he seemed to be on the guard for [[the Art]].
document_data.History: In late mid-{{yearlink|1357}}, Berost was one of the men-at-arms accompanying [[Shandril Shessair]] and [[Narm Tamaraith]] to [[Storm Silverhand]]'s home. There, he drew his sword at the sound of a harp playing by itself, only to be shushed by a veteran fellow.
